text:
ASK ABOUT OUR VEGAN OPTIONS
?

CAN BE MADE GLUTEN FRIENDLY
(GF)

THE BIG BREAKFAST (GF) $17.5

Two eggs, choice of bacon, ham, or sausage, toast & home fries. Choice of Finn pancakes, 2 French toast or waffles

PANCAKES, WAFFLES OR FRENCH TOAST (GF)$14.5
Four firm pancakes or choice of 3 waffles or french toast with ham, bacon, or sausage. Gluten free add $3.

STUFFED FRENCH TOAST OR WAFFLES (GF) $16.5
Two pieces of French Toast or Waffles stuffed with cream cheese, topped with cherry, blueberry or apple. Served with ham, bacon or sausage. Gluten Free add 3


GLUTEN FREE POTATO PANCAKES (4) $15.5
Our interpretation with sun dried tomatoes, mozzarella cheese and a hint of green onions. Served with sour cream.

__________________________________________

RECOMMENDED

STEAK & EGGS (GF) $24
6oz AAA New York strip and eggs cooked the way you like them served with hand cut home fries and choice of toast.

————————————————————–

BREAKFAST 1, 2 OR 3 (GF)
Eggs any style with choice of bacon, ham or sausage. Includes toast and home fries. Options include: Breakfast 2 eggs (no meat) for $10, Breakfast 2 eggs for $12, Breakfast 3 eggs for $13, respectively.

BREAKFAST SCRAMBLER (GF) $16.5
Choice of bacon, ham, or sausage, with sautéed onions, fresh mushrooms and fresh bell peppers topped with cheddar cheese. Served with toast & home fries.

BREAKFAST QUESADILLA $17.5
Scrambled eggs with bacon, potatoes, tomatoes & cheese. Served in a flour tortilla with a side of salsa & sour cream.

BREAKFAST BURRITO $17.5
Ham, bacon or sausage, sautéed onions, peppers & mushrooms served in a 12” shell and topped with cheese. Includes sour cream and salsa, and side of home fries. Add $2 for all 3 meats.

ULTIMATE BREAKFAST BOWL (GF) $17.5
Hand cut home fries with ham, bacon and sausage, chorizo sausage, scrambled eggs, topped with cheese then smothered in a buttery hollandaise sauce.

FRIED EGG GRILLED CHEESE (GF) $10
A fried egg on a grilled cheese sandwich. Gluten free add $3.

ROOSTER TOPPER (GF) $9.5
English muffin with one egg, bacon, ham or sausage with cheese

Add Ons:

Bacon, ham, or sausage $4, Chicken $5, Peameal Bacon $5, Shaved steak $6, Kielbasa $6, 6oz NY strip $10, 9oz Lobster tail $27 (price reflects market value and is subjet to change), Side Hollandaise $2.5, Side Nutella $1

ROOSTER’S BENNY BOARD
Our hollandaise is Gluten Free

THE CLASSIC (GF) $18
Classic Benedict with toasted English muffin, grilled smoked ham, poached eggs topped with a buttery hollandaise sauce.



THE POSEIDON (GF) $37
An 8oz lobster tail butterflied, served on toasted English muffins with sliced tomato, poached eggs topped with a Parmesan hollandaise sauce.


VEGETARIAN BENNY (GF) $21?
Poached eggs atop grilled asparagus, spinach, avocado, sun-dried tomato and feta served on English muffins with buttery hollandaise. Includes a side of salsa.

MEXI BENNY $21?
Fiesta grilled jalapeno infused chicken breast, salsa, sour cream and poached eggs atop an English muffin. Add avocado for $2.

NEW!

THE EL TRES (GF) $21?
Chorizo sausage, English muffin, poached eggs and hollandaise topped with a black bean, corn and lime salsa, El Tres Green hot sauce, cilantro, and sour cream.



NEW!

THE VIKING (GF) $23
4oz of Norwegian Salmon, toasted English Muffin and poached eggs topped with a buttery dilled hollandaise and a sprinkle of fresh lemon zest.



“THE WALLEYE” $25
6 oz Pan fried walleye with a hint of lemon on a grilled English muffin, topped with poached eggs and hollandaise. Served with home fries.

KING BENNY (GF) $37
A 7oz beef tenderloin on a toasted English muffin with sliced tomato, poached eggs and topped with Parmesan hollandaise sauce.


BRUSCHETTA BENNY (GF) $22?
Grilled English muffin, poached eggs, pesto hollandaise, fresh Bruschetta mix and home fries.

UKRAINIAN BENEDICT (GF) $23.5
A toasted English muffin stacked with a potato pancake and mini Kielbasa sausage, poached eggs, topped with a buttery hollandaise sauce.

THE GREAT CANADIAN (GF) $22.5
A toasted English muffin with peameal bacon, poached eggs, topped with buttery hollandaise and sprinkled with Parmesan cheese.

THREE EGG OMELETTE BOARD
Served with toast (white, rye or multigrain) and home fries.
Egg white only omelettes add $2, Gluten free toast add $3
Add a side of Rooster’s Classic Hollandaise $2.50



THE EL TRES $19
Chorizo packed omelette topped with Heartbeat Hot Sauce El Tres Green, sour cream and black bean corn salsa infused with lime and cilantro.

HAM & CHEESE (GF) $18
Savoury diced breakfast ham, cheddar and blended cheddar folded into fluffy scrambled eggs. Sometimes less is more!!

THE GREEK (GF) $19?
Treat yourself to the taste of Mediterranean! Loaded with green and red peppers, green and red onions, oregano and a healthy portion of feta cheese.

DENVER OR WESTERN (GF) $17
Keep it classic with your choice of bacon or ham, packed with green peppers, mushrooms, onions and a cheddar blend.

HEAT SEEKER (GF) $19??
Wake up your tastebuds with this lively option. Roasted red peppers, tomatoes, red onions, basil, banana peppers, spinach and mozarella cheese. Made with HeartBeat Red Habanero hot sauce!

MEAT LOVERS $19
Bacon, ham, sausage and cheddar cheese. Your hearty go to!

VEGETARIAN (GF) $19?
Veggie lovers rejoice! Jam packed with sautéed asparagus, spinach, mushrooms, bell peppers, red onion and a cheddar blend.

Heartbeat Hot Sauce Bottles 12
Scorpion | Dill Serrano | Red Habanero| Blueberry Habanero| El Tres Green|Pineapple Habanero

SWEET TOOTH TO GO


CINNAMON BUNS $2.5
BUTTER TARTS $1.5



CINNAMON BUN GRILLER $2.75
Fresh warm cinnamon buns grilled to perfection and served with caramel or chocolate syrup.








NIBBLING & NOSHING
VEGETARIAN
?

SPICY
?

ASK ABOUT OUR VEGAN OPTIONS
?

CAN BE MADE GLUTEN FRIENDLY
(GF)

QUESADILLA $16.5?
Chicken, bacon or both! Sautéed veggies & 3 cheeses wrapped in a 12″ tortilla. Served with salsa and sour cream. Add shaved steak for $4. Ask server for our vegan option.

CHICKEN CAESAR WRAP $13.5
Crisp romaine, chicken pieces, bacon bits, Parmesan and Asiago Caesar dressing. Make it crispy Buffalo chicken Add $1.5

FETA WRAP $13.5
Diced chicken, romaine, cucumber, peppers, onions & feta cheese

VEGAN WRAP $16.5??
Grilled marinated tofu, roasted red peppers, red onions, fresh spinach, hummus and sun-dried tomato vegan mayo wrapped in a fresh tortilla.

REUBEN WRAP $15.5??
Filled with all the classic flavours and ingredients as our sandwich: corned beef, sauerraut, swiss cheese, diced dill pickles on the inside, and your choise of mustard or 1000 island. Add Dill pickle heartbeat hotsauce for $1



ROOSTER WRAP $13.5
Chicken, cheese, beer infused onions, peppers, mushrooms with lettuce & tomato. Served with your choice of Ranch, Honey Mustard or Italian dressing

STEAK & CHEESE WRAP $14.5
New York Strip, beer infused onions, bell peppers, button mushrooms, cheese blend, romaine and chipotle aioli

ROOSTER TOES $12
Breaded chicken strips served with Dill, Ranch, Honey Mustard, BBQ or Plum sauce

Add Ons:

Poutine $6?
Caesar $5
Garlic Fries $5
Sweet Potato Fries $5
Onion Rings $5
Fries $5
Garden Salad $5
Soup $5
Gravy $2.50

FLATBREADS & ROOSTER BOWLS
VEGAN BOWL (GF) $16.5??
Fresh spinach, grilled peppers, onions &asparagus, avocado, grilled tofu, toasted chickpeas and vegan cheese on a bed of quinoa with sun-dried tomato vegan mayo drizzle

THE CLUCK NORRIS POUTINE $16.5
Crispy chicken tossed in a spicy sauce blend atop our hand cut fries, curds, gravy ans drizzled with our house made honey dill. Poutine with a kick

PHILLY CHEESE STYLE POUTINE $16.5
Phil your bellies with shaved steak, sauteed onions, mushrooms atop our hand-cut home fries, curds, gravy & drizzled with our house-made peppercorn ranch.

CLASSIC POUTINE $12.5??
Real cheese curds topped with a thick special blend gravy

MEXI POUTINE (GF) $16.5
Diced chicken, shredded cheese, corn chips, salsa, sour cream and green onions all topped with Heartbeat hot sauce. Delicioso!

CANADIANA BREAKFAST (GF) $16,5
Bacon and cheese curds, tater tots, scrambled eggs hollandaise sauce and Nor’wester maple syrup. get your Canadian pride on eh…



MEAL SIZED SALADS


All produce for our salads are picked fresh on a daily basis and topped with one of our sensational dressings (Ranch, Honey Mustard, Blue Cheese, French, Balsamic (GF) , Raspberry, Italian, Oil & Vinegar, 1,000 Island)



CAESAR SIDE:$7 I Full: $14
Romaine, bacon, grated Parmesan cheese and croutons.

GARDEN SIDE: $6.5 I Full: $12.5?
Lettuce, peppers, carrots, cucumbers, celery, onions & tomatoes.

GREEK SIDE: $8 I Full: $16?
Romaine lettuce, onions, peppers, tomatoes, cucumber, feta & black olives. Side: $6 | Full: $15



CHEF’S $16.5
Lettuce, tomatoes, peppers, onions, carrots, celery, cucumber, ham, cheese & hard boiled egg

CHICKEN OR TUNA BELT $16.5
Salad greens with chopped bacon, cucumbers, tomatoes, peppers, onions & a hard boiled egg






THE SANDWICH STOP
VEGETARIAN
?

SPICY
?

ASK ABOUT OUR VEGAN OPTIONS
?

CAN BE MADE GLUTEN FRIENDLY
(GF)

We cook our own roasts, turkeys & Hams on a daily basis.
All sandwiches can be made Gluten Free add $3

PHILLY CHEESE STEAK $15.5
Shaved steak, sautéed onions and mushrooms topped with provalone cheese on a hogie bun

RUEBEN $15.5
Corned beef stacked high with sauerkraut, Swiss cheese topped wih mustard or 1,000 Island. Served with a crispy Kosher dill

GRILLED MELT $15.5
Tuna or chicken breast topped with mozzarella cheese and tomato, grilled on a 12 grain artisan bun.

ROOSTER CLUB $15.5
Ham, turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato & cedar cheese on 2 slices of break

HOT NIP $15.5
6oz fresh ground chuck patty with sliced red onions served on a Brioche bun with fries and gravy.

SANDWICH BOARD $8.5
Choice of egg salad, tuna salad or grilled cheese

DENVER, BLT OR WESTERN $11.5



RECOMMENDED
STEAK SANDWICH $24
6oz AAA NY strip grilled to perfection with sauteed mushrooms & onions, served on garlic toast. Served with hand cut French fries.

MONTE CRISTO $15.5
Ham and turkey smothered with mozzarella cheese served on French toast.

CHICKEN PARMESAN $15.5
Panko crusted balsamic marinated chicken breast with parmesan, basil, oregano, mozzarella and banana peppers. Topped with our house made sauce on spacatelli bun.

CHICKEN CLUB $15.5
Breaded chicken, bacon, cheese, lettuce & tomato served on a spacatelli

JIM’S TBS $15.5
Shaved turkey, bacon & mozzarella cheese on rye bread.

HOT TURKEY OR BEEF $16.5
Smothered in thick gravy with fries and coleslaw.

Sandwich, Burger, and Wrap Add Ons:

Poutine $6?
Caesar $5
Garlic Fries $5
Sweet Potato Fries $5
Onion Rings $5
Fries $5
Garden Salad $5
Soup $5
Gravy $2.50



BURGERS, BURGERS, BURGERS
All our burgers are made with 6oz of ground chuck.
Served on a brioche bun w/ lettuce, tomato & onion.
All burgers can be made Gluten Free add $3

BONOBO’S BOUNTIFUL BURGER $15.5 ?
Locally handmade vegan seed patty by Bonobo’s Foods, guacomole, tomato, roasted red peppers, spinach, feta, and balsamic drizzle on a brioche bun

SLEEPING GIANT $15.5
Beer infused onions, cheddar Mozzarella, peameal bacon & BBQ sauce.



BACON MOZZA BBQ MUSHROOM $15.5
A crispy onion ring, hickory smoked bacon, mozzarella cheese, sautéed mushrooms and house made BBQ sauce.

THE ANGRY ROOSTER ?$15.5
Not named after the owner but comes with plenty of attitude… smoked bacon, aged cheddar, crispy fried jalapenos and Siracha aioli.

HENHOUSE BURGER $15.5
Served with one clucking over easy atop a juicy crusted chicken breast. Topped with mozzarella, lettuce, tomato and house-made basil mayo.

Sandwich, Burger, and Wrap Add Ons:
Poutine $6?
Caesar $5
Garlic Fries $5
Sweet Potato Fries $5
Onion Rings $5
Fries $5
Garden Salad $5
Soup $5
Gravy $2.50
name: Rooster's Bistro
